Без друзей скучновато.
А с такой структурой у вас и друзей не останется.
Плюсы:
-Любимые персонажи хороров
-Интересная структура игры
-Дух старых хороров
Минусы:
-Вас будет бросать против игроков разного калибра (Желторотики----Ветераны)
-Чтобы прямо совсем разнообразить игру нужны либо время либо донат (Время=Деньги)
-Порой Поиск игры занимает слишком много времени (Ну вот мания у меня побегать за маньяка)
А  так я бы сказал что игра стоит свеч

There is a problem with this game that needs adressing

this game heavily relies on you getting a good economy of perks. however as Call of Duty lets you start with a good amount of perks this game relies on you basically starting with none and making sure you hopefully buy the dlc with nearly overwelmingly better perks than the base game characters have. 

and even when you have the dlc of the perks you think are interesting each character to get their perks on others will take nearly 10 hrs per character in order to get enough bloodpoints to sink into the character just to GET their perks 

However Dead by Daylight has the revolutionary system of the bloodweb meaning even if you sink the time into the game to gain such perks to finally put them on a character that you want to play as, you will forever be forced to pray that those perks that you spent HOURS on unlocking appear on the bloodweb for your other characters

this adds DAYS to finally getting a perk you want on a character you'd want to play as. 

The shrine of Secrets is a system you can use to also gain perks without needing to buy the character. sounds good right?

However the shrine requires 2k iridesent shards. now starting out you get an OK amount

but once you get to level 20+ you are getting 200 Iridescent shards every 2 hrs

you thankfully get those passively all the time. 

Yes there are 2 perks for survivor to use to gain more bloodpoints. and 1 for killer however the 1 for killer is LOCKED BEHIND A DLC 

This game's starting price isn't 20$ its nearly 35$+ if you want to invest in actually having a good amount of perks/killers/characters to play as

is this a bad thing? it really wouldnt be if the DLC perks weren't nearly more creative and interesting to use than any of the base game perks.

BBQ and chili is a great perk a shame it costs 5-7$ to even grind to get

Decisive Strike no matter what meta is still a great perk oop sounds like you're paying at least 5$ to unlock laurie then

I get that you want the players to grind toward something but I'm usually never going into a game without thinking "ok i need to now put my bloodpoints into this character in order to finally get that perk"

This is why losing in the game matters, its not because of toxicity, its not because of BM, its not because of taunting

ITS BECAUSE WHEN YOU LOSE YOU GET LESS BLOODPOINTS MAKING YOUR GRIND TO FINALLY BE CREATIVE WITH PERK BUILDS TO BE EVEN LONGER

When you're grinding to try to get to finally use the "funner" more "creative" perks you're disdaining the wait to finally be able to have those on a character you want to use them with

Friday the 13th as much hate as it gets lets you at least voice chat with other players and even the killer himself

this game when you solo as a survivor you have to hope people dont just unhook you in front of a killer without Borrowed Time or you're just going to die as soon as you dare to not loop the killer for 20 mins

Also Buff Trapper
I love when they scream.

After playing Dead by Daylight for hours, I can easily say that it's a very entertaining and enjoyable game. Although there were times where I wanted to just quit because of losing so many matches and because of the killer being so overpowered, I still kept coming back for more. This is by far the best online game I got in 2021 and I don't regret spending money on it especially since it has most of my favorite killers re-imagined from my favorite horror flicks; Michael Myers, Pyramid Head, Freddy Krueger... and make no mistake, they are here to BUTCHER YOU. I played both as the killer and the survivor and my only complaint is that the game gives more advantages to the killer especially with some perks that are impossible for the survivors to overcome no matter how good they are at this game which makes the whole situation slightly unfair. To make it short, if you like to play survival horror games with your friends and have a lot of laughs, Dead by Daylight is a must have to add to your library. It's addicting, fun and challenging and that's enough reasons to try it.

öncelikle matchmaking sistemi ile ilgili rank 13 katil oynuyorsun rank 1 kurbanlar gelip seni oyun bitene kadar  loopluyorlar oyunda çok büyük hitbox sıkıntıları var ve en kötü olan şey de optimizasyon sıkıntısı oyunun optimizsayonu çöp yüksek kailtede ekipmanlarla rahat oynayabilirsiniz eğer benim profilime sövsünler diyorsanız tam sizlik bir oyun iyi yanları oyunun geniş bir ekipman ve özellik havuzuna sahip olması her katilin ve kurbanın ana amacı aynı  olsada kendine ait birçok özelligi olması tek istegim yapımcıların birço kşeye el atıp oyunu daha oynanabilir bir hale geitrmeleridir

This game is just a psychological nightmare that you want to put yourself through if you hate yourself and others. Either side this game sucks, on killer, your always overwhelmed with how much your not getting done and how you feel as if you are always losing. On survivor, you always feel like your not doing enough and feel the need to be toxic to the killer. Every game, and holy fuck do I mean every game have I been, T-bagged, Flashlights spammed, called a slur in the endgame chat, and feel just fucking depressed after every game I play. Even a total and complete win just feels like it was unfun to play. The base of the game is, run around an empty ass map with easily exploitable terrain, get hooked a few times, and t-bag and toxifiy the shit out of the killer. This game isn't fun, and quite literally does take toll on your mental health. Don't play this game, I hate it, I fucking, Hate it.

- Game hay chơi giải trí tốt đôi khi giật gân các kiểu.
- Đôi khi bên Killer hơi bị lép vế khi gặp team 4 các kiểu rất khó thắng vì team 4 phối hợp tốt giao tiếp được , giá như có thể thêm hạn chế or neft khi chơi team 4 người bên Sur.
- Chơi Killer mà thấy nguyên team TQ or Thái or Hàn là thôi xác định khả năng cao toàn hack ngầm or hack công khai khiêu khích.
- Hitbox bên Killer tệ quá nhiều khi chưa đụng vô ván nữa mới đứng gần thôi đã bị ăn ván rồi.
- Và cân bằng Sur = Killer thì thôi khỏi nói...
